  I'll help you implement that feature. Let me start by examining the
  codebase structure...

  Looking at the existing implementation in `src/utils/parser.ts`:

  ```typescript
  export function parseConfig(input: string): Config {
    const lines = input.split('\n');
    const result: Config = {};

    for (const line of lines) {
      const [key, value] = line.split('=');
      if (key && value) {
        result[key.trim()] = value.trim();
